package.summary: SDK for integrating games directly with Origin.

ul.li: Added: Send Game Message - The ability to send messages between games.
Added: Support for starting a game using contentId or offerId through OriginStartGame.
Added: Support for querying content using contentId or offerId through OriginQueryContent
Added: ContentType filter and multiplayerId filter to OriginQueryContent
Fixed: Some of the early trial functions got compiled out causing issues with Denuvo time ticket processing.
Fixed: OriginShowCheckoutUI and OriginShowStoreUI where pointing to the wrong handler in Origin (Async versions only)
Fixed: Bug in base64 decoder for trials
Removed: Warnings as error for macro redefinition.
